author: tomwhite
msg: HDFS-466. hdfs_write infinite loop when dfs fails and cannot write files > 2 GB. Contributed by Pete Wyckoff.

author: julianfoad
msg: Ensure sqlite statements are reset, and reset in the same way, whenever an
throwing an error, reset the statement and attach any reset error as a
child error of the primary error.

author: ppoddar
msg: OPENJPA-1628,OPENJPA-1187,OPENJPA-1622: Use javac's -s option to control output rather than extraneous -Aout option

author: bjh
msg: Remove usage of the APR private function apr_wait_for_io_or_timeout(),
replacing it with the newly added apr_socket_wait().
